title: Stage S22
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Would you mind opening the window?
Could you please help me with this report?
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Would you mind opening the window?
Could you please help me with this report?

sentences.kr: 조언을 좀 해주실 수 있는지 궁금해서요.
sentences.en: I was wondering if you could give me some advice.
Would it be possible for you to stay a bit later?
I'd be grateful if you could review this document.

sentences.kr: 차를 빌려주실 수 있을 것 같나요?
sentences.en: Do you think you could lend me your car?
Would you be so kind as to show me the way?

sentences.kr: 번거롭게 해서 죄송하지만, 도와주실 수 있나요?
sentences.en: I hate to bother you, but could you help me?

sentences.kr: 괜찮으시다면 전화기 좀 빌려주실 수 있나요?
sentences.en: If you don't mind, could I borrow your phone?
I wonder if I might ask you a favor.
